subpanels.description: One of the original syntypes of Aplocheilus andamanicus collected by Day (1878) from the Andamans, now lectotype, BMNH 1870.5.18.34-36, 74.8 mm SL, Port Blair
Topotypes of A. andamanicus, male, BNHS FWF 563, 65.2 mm SL, collected from south Andaman Island
Topotypes of A. panchax, male, BNHS FWF 569, 28.3 mm SL, collected from West Bengal, India
